metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3704 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found inRuby on Rails. This affects an unknown part of the fileactionpack/lib/action_dispatch/middleware/templates/routes/_table.html.erb.The manipulation leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiatethe attack remotely. The real existence of this vulnerability is stilldoubted at the moment. The name of the patch isbe177e4566747b73ff63fd5f529fab564e475ed4. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability isVDB-212319. NOTE: Maintainer declares that there isnâ€™t a valid attackvector. The issue was wrongly reported as a security vulnerability by anon-member of the Rails team.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
